name: Pictionary
rules: Player 2 tries to guess the object player 1 drew

name: Sudoku
rules: Follow link provided and complete a puzzle! (Or at least try to)

name: Word Search
rules: Follow link provided and complete a puzzle! (Or at least try to)

name: Charades
rules: Player 1 presents an act to the other players
Other players attempt to guess what player 1 is acting out

name: Wikipedia Game
category: problem-solving link provided and complete a puzzle! (Or at least try to)
rules: Players think of two random pages that can be found on Wikipedia
Players then attempt to navigate from the first random page to the other using ONLY links in articles on Wikipedia

name: 20 Questions
rules: Players decide on a category to base the game off of
Player 1 thinks of an item in the category chosen
All other players ask 'Yes' or 'No' questions to find out what Player 1 is thinking
Player 1 wins if the others cannot guess their item in 20 guesses

name: Things Game
rules: Player 1 asks a question starting with the word 'Things'
Other Players send a response they feel is funny
Player 1 reads out the responses received
Other players vote on the best response (no voting for yourself)
